text: Hayato Ikeda was a Japanese politician. He was Prime Minister of Japan 3 times. In 1960 Ikeda made a plan called the "Income Doubling Plan". The plan would use construction to double the economy of Japan. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:1965 deaths Category:Politicians from Hiroshima Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Ministers of finance of Japan
title: Hayato Ikeda
